alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:55AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Russell and Barton Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 355 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Milberger, or 10 miles south of Russell, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Russell, Hoisington, Ellinwood, Wilson, Claflin, Gorham, Pawnee Rock, Dorrance, Albert, Olmitz, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Galatia, Susank, Great Bend Airport, Russell Airport, Cheyenne Bottoms, Wilson State Park and Wilson Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 176 and 205. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
